questions: Can you explain your experience working with Microsoft SQL Server/Microsoft BI and AWS Redshift?
How have you utilized your skills in Business Intelligence (BI), Data Warehouse (DWH), and Data Analytics in your previous projects?
What tools have you worked with in the past such as SQL Server Management Studio, Microsoft Visual Studio, Business Intelligence Development Studio, and SSIS?
Can you provide an example of a project where you wrote scripts and indexing strategies for a migration to AWS Redshift from SQL Server and MySQL databases?
How have you used SSIS to create packages and data flow transformations in your previous roles?
Describe your experience in writing complex SQL queries, joins, and importing/exporting data between databases and files
How have you applied Python and SQL in your technical projects, particularly with libraries such as Numpy, Pandas, and Matplotlib?
In what ways have you used ETL tools like SSIS and cloud platforms like AWS Redshift in your projects?
Can you elaborate on your role as a Software Developer at Bixware Technologies, specifically in the ETL and Cube projects for More Retail Limited?
How have you contributed to the development and maintenance of sales and inventory cubes, as well as the deployment of monitoring systems on AWS in your previous roles?
